price: (Saa Da no) wͻbεka sε (afei deε) yɛagye adi; na εbεyε dεn na wͻbɛnya (gyidie) wͻ baabi akyirikyiri (saa)?
arabic: وَقَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلتَّنَاوُشُ مِن مَّكَانِۭ بَعِيدٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waqālū āmannā bihi wa-annā lahumu al-tanāwushu min makānin baʿīdin
